00008 #ifndef PORT_H
00009 #define PORT_H
00010 
00011 #include "config.h"

00013 #define PORT_ARM7
00014 
00016 #define PORT_A AT91C_BASE_PIOA
00017 
00018 /* By default all ports default to inputs with pullups enabled.  */
00019 
00020 #define PORT_BITS_MASK(first, last) ((1 << ((last) + 1)) - (1 << (first)))
00021 
00022 typedef AT91S_PIO *port_t;
00023 typedef uint32_t port_bit_t;
00024 typedef uint32_t port_data_t;
00025 typedef uint32_t port_mask_t;
00026 
00027 
00028 
00030 #define port_read(port) (port)->PIO_PDSR
00031 
00033 #define port_get(port) (port)->PIO_ODSR
00034 
00036 #define port_write(port, value) \
00037     do {(port)->PIO_SODR = (value); \
00038         (port)->PIO_CODR = ~(value);} while (0)
00039 
00041 #define port_pins_config_output(port, pins) \
00042     do {(port)->PIO_PER = (pins); (port)->PIO_OER = (pins);} while (0)
00043 
00045 #define port_pins_config_input(port, pins) \
00046     do {(port)->PIO_ODR = (pins);               \
00047         (port)->PIO_PER = (pins);               \
00048         (port)->PIO_PPUDR = (pins);} while (0)
00049 
00051 #define port_pins_config_pullup(port, pins) \
00052     do {(port)->PIO_ODR = (pins);               \
00053         (port)->PIO_PER = (pins);               \
00054         (port)->PIO_PPUER = (pins); } while (0)
00055 
00058 #define port_pins_config_peripheral(port, pins) \
00059         (port)->PIO_PDR = (pins)
00060 
00061 
00063 #define port_pins_set_high(port, pins) (port)->PIO_SODR = (pins)
00064 
00066 #define port_pins_set_low(port, pins) (port)->PIO_CODR = (pins)
00067 
00069 #define port_pins_set(port, pins, state)  \
00070     do {if (state)                              \
00071             port_pins_set_high (port, pins);    \
00072         else                                    \
00073             port_pins_set_low (port, pins);} while (0)
00074 
00076 #define port_pins_toggle(port, pins) \
00077     do {port_data_t _tmp = ~port_get (port); \
00078         port_pins_write (port, pins, _tmp);} while (0)
00079 
00081 #define port_pins_read(port, pins) (port_read (port) & (pins))
00082 
00084 #define port_pins_get(port, pins) (port_get (port) & (pins))
00085 
00087 #define port_pins_write(port, pins, value) \
00088     do {(port)->PIO_SODR = (pins) & (value); \
00089         (port)->PIO_CODR = (pins) & ~(value);} while (0)
00090 
00092 #define port_pin_config_output(port, pin) \
00093     port_pins_config_output (port, BIT (pin))
00094 
00096 #define port_pin_config_input(port, pin) \
00097     port_pins_config_input (port, BIT (pin))
00098 
00100 #define port_pin_config_pullup(port, pin) \
00101     port_pins_config_pullup (port, BIT (pin))
00102 
00105 #define port_pin_config_peripheral(port, pin) \
00106     port_pins_config_peripheral (port, BIT (pin))
00107 
00109 #define port_pin_set_high(port, pin) port_pins_set_high (port, BIT (pin))
00110 
00112 #define port_pin_set_low(port, pin) port_pins_set_low (port, BIT (pin))
00113 
00115 #define port_pin_toggle(port, pin) port_pins_toggle (port, BIT (pin))
00116 
00118 #define port_pin_get(port, pin) (port_pins_get (port, BIT (pin)) != 0)
00119 
00121 #define port_pin_read(port, pin) (port_pins_read (port, BIT (pin)) != 0)
00122 
00125 #define port_pin_write(port, pin, state)             \
00126     ((state) ? port_pin_set_high ((port), BIT (pin)) \
00127            : port_pin_set_low ((port), BIT (pin))
00128 
00129 
00131 #define port_bus_config_output(port, pin1, pin2) \
00132     port_pins_config_output (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))
00133 
00135 #define port_bus_config_input(port, pin1, pin2) \
00136     port_pins_config_input (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))
00137 
00139 #define port_bus_config_pullup(port, pin) \
00140     port_pins_config_pullup (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))
00141 
00143 #define port_bus_write(port, pin1, pin2, value)                          \
00144     port_write ((port), (port_get (port) & ~PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2)) \
00145               | (((value) & PORT_BITS_MASK (0, pin2 - pin1)) << (pin1)))
00146 
00148 #define port_bus_read(port, pin1, pin2) \
00149     ((port_read (port) & PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2) >> (pin1))
00150 
00152 #define port_init(port) \
00153     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PCER = BIT (AT91C_ID_PIOA)
00154 
00156 #define port_shutdown(port) \
00157     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PCDR = BIT (AT91C_ID_PIOA)
00158 
00159 #endif
